author: Buchanan, George, 1506-1582
title: Rervm Scoticarvm historia libris XX descripta. Qvi regionvm sitvs, qvod soli cæliqve sit ingenivm, qvæ vetvsta gentis nomina, mores, leges, et instituta, quiq[ue] primi cultores fuerint insularum, quæ veteribus Britanniæ vocantur, á primordio repentens ..
imprint: "Francofvrti ad Moenvm.: J. Feyrabend for Heirs of S. Feyrabend, 1594"
